verbose_text: However, treatment with the ATM inhibitor, KU55933, and the class III PI3K inhibitor, LY290042 and 3-MA, abolished the intracellular total cholesterol accumulation induced by chloroquine (702.8 +/-78.6 vs. 1038.5 +/-88.3 mg/g protein), (753.3 +/-82.5 vs. 1038.5 +/-88.3 mg/g protein) or (732.2 +/-76.3 vs. 1038.5 +/-88.3 mg/g protein), respectively (XREF_FIG).
evidence: KU55933, and the class III PI3K inhibitor, LY290042 and 3-MA, abolished the intracellular total cholesterol
